ai_explanation.introduction_english: Let's dive into the term "とうじ," which is commonly heard when people recall something from a specific time period in the past. This word helps bring context and clarity when reflecting on certain moments.
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word "とうじ" means "at that time" or "back then". It's used to refer to a specific point in the past, giving context to an event or situation.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

at that time.MY: အဲဒီအချိန်မှာ

Touji.MY: အဲ့ဒီအချိန်မှာ

examples.kanji: 当時の時代は面白かった。
examples.furigana: 当時(とうじ)の時代(じだい)は面白(おもしろ)かった。

translations.EN: The era back then was interesting.
translations.ES: La época de entonces era interesante.
translations.VI: Thời đại lúc đó rất thú vị.
translations.MY: အဲဒီခေတ်တွေ စိတ်ဝင်စားဖို့ကောင်းတယ်။
translations.HI: उस समय की अवधि रोचक थी।
translations.AR: كانت الفترة في ذلك الوقت مثيرة.

examples.kanji: 当時の状況は大変でした。
examples.furigana: 当時(とうじ)の状況(じょうきょう)は大変(たいへん)でした。

translations.EN: The situation at that time was difficult.
translations.ES: La situación en ese momento era difícil.
translations.VI: Tình hình vào thời điểm đó rất khó khăn.
translations.FR: La situation à l'époque était difficile.
translations.MY: အချိန်အခါက အခြေအနေ ကြီးမားပါတယ်။
translations.HI: उस समय की स्थिति कठिन थी।
translations.AR: كانت الظروف في ذلك الوقت صعبة.
translations.FA: وضعیت در آن زمان دشوار بود.

examples.kanji: 当時の思い出は懐かしいです。
examples.furigana: 当時(とうじ)の思い出(おもいで)は懐(なつ)かしいです。

translations.EN: Memories of those days are nostalgic.
translations.ES: Los recuerdos de aquellos días son nostálgicos.
translations.VI: Ký ức về những ngày đó thật hoài niệm.
translations.FR: Les souvenirs de cette époque sont nostalgiques.
translations.TL: Naaalala ko nang may nostalgia ang mga alaala ng panahong iyon.
translations.MY: အဲဒီအချိန်က အမှတ်ရကြောင်းတွေကို နောင်ကြေးတရ နဲ့ အခေါ်ဘွယ်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: उन दिनों की यादें बहुत नॉस्टेल्जिक हैं।

examples.kanji: 当時の恋愛は簡単だった。
examples.furigana: 当時(とうじ)の恋愛(れんあい)は簡単(かんたん)だった。

translations.EN: Love at that time was simple.
translations.ES: El amor en ese entonces era sencillo.
translations.VI: Tình yêu lúc đó rất đơn giản.
translations.FR: L'amour à cette époque était simple.
translations.MY: အဆိုပါအခါကအချစ်ကိုရိုးရှင်းမှုကြောင်းဖြစ်သည်။
translations.HI: उस समय का प्यार आसान था।
translations.AR: كان الحب في ذلك الوقت بسيطًا.
translations.FA: عشق در آن زمان ساده بود.

synonyms: その時 : そのとき : at that time
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of "とうじ" is "そのとき." Both indicate a point in time, but "そのとき" can be more general, referring to any time in the past, present, or future, while "とうじ" is specifically about the past.
antonyms: 現在 : げんざい : the present
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of "とうじ" is "げんざい." While "とうじ" refers to a time in the past, "げんざい" refers to the present time or moment, highlighting the contrasts between past happenings and current situations.

collocations: とうじのじょうきょう
